alert.note: Alert for Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 9:32PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Monterey County through 1000 PM PDT... At 932 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lucia, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tassajara Hot Springs, Lucia, Esalen Institute, Partington Ridge and Julia Pfeiffer Burns State Park. This includes Highway 1 between Mile Markers 16 and 19, and between Mile Markers 23 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
